20504.「よう ジェイコフ。\n その若いのが ウワサの新しい弟子かい？: Hey, Jakov. This one your new students?

20506.「これは これは ゴードンさん。\n 相変わらず お元気そうで なによりですな。:
Well, if it isn't Gordon. You're looking
healthy as ever, I see! Is there something
I can help you with...?

20508.「んだぁっ！？\n テメーは アニキに聞かれたことにだけ\n 答えてりゃあいいん:
H-hey!! You should only be answering what he
asked you!!

20510.「ハハ…… こりゃ すみません。\n ええ。おっしゃる通り こいつが\n 新しい:
Aha... Sorry about that. Yes, that's right.
This here's <pc>, my new pupil.

20512.「ほらっ。オメーも ゴードンさんに\n ごあいさつしねえか！: Go on, you say hello to Gordon too!

20514.「ああ いい いい。……で 約束通り\n こいつを モンスター勝ち抜きバトルの\:
Yes, very good... So, as promised, we're
putting <if_woman>her<else>him<endif> in the Monster
Knockout Battle, right?

20515.「はい それはもう！ こいつが 戦って\n 借金が チャラになるんなら\n 何百:
Yes, absolutely! If <if_woman>her<else>his<endif> fighting can clear
my debts, I'll have 'em fight hundreds of times...
thousands of times if I need to!

20516.「あんたも カネにだらしない師匠を\n 持っちまって 災難だよなぁ。\n ククク:
You've got my pity being stuck with a master
so money-hungry... Heh heh heh...
I truly feel for you, I do.

20517.「モンスター勝ち抜きバトルってーと\n ブランドン様のペットたちと 戦うのかよ？:
So...this Monster Knockout Battle means
fightin' Mr. Brandon's pets, huh?
Poor sap... I feel bad for 'em.

20518.「……いいだろう。こいつなら\n 中年バトルマスターを戦わせるより\n 客も 呼:
It's fine. This one here'll bring in a way
bigger crowd than watching some crusty old
master fight.

20519.「せいぜい いい仕事をして 盛り上げてくれよ。\n 受け付けは いつも通り クラ:
Make sure to do well and keep things lively.
Clark'll take care of the reception, so make
sure you go and talk with him.

20520.「全国１０００万のコロシアムファンの皆さま\n たいへん お待たせしました！\n:
To our Coliseum's 10 million fans, we have
quite the spectacle for you today! A brawl of
bloody proportions is about to begin!

20521.「コロシアムの裏名物 モンスター勝ち抜き戦！\n 今夜の挑戦者は 若きバトルマス:
It's the Coliseum's hidden attraction: the Monster Knockout Battle! Tonight's challenger is an up and coming battlemaster!
Give it up for !

20522.<if_woman>「はたして 彼女は 無事に\n リングを下りることが できる:
Will this young <if_woman>woman<else>man<endif> make it out of the ring
in one piece? The fated hour draws ever
closer!

20523.「見事 イエティを倒した\n <pc>選手。あと１勝。\n あと１勝すれば 勝利:
What a marvelous job in defeating that Powie
Yowie! One match... Just one match is all that
lies between <if_woman>her<else>him<endif> and a glorious victory!

20524.<if_woman>「しかし 立ちはだかるカベは あまりに高い。\n ３回戦の相:
But we never said it would be easy! <if_woman>Her<else>His<endif>
opponent in the third and final round is the
Knight Errant. What will <if_woman>she<else>he<endif> do this time?!

20526.「なんと！ なんと！ なんと！\n 今日のバトルが 始まる前に\n 誰が この結:
T-this is unbelievable! Can you believe it?!
Did anyone see THIS coming?! I bet you
didn't!

20527.「私は 今 新たなコロシアムの伝説の誕生に\n 立ち会っているのかもしれません。:
Folks, we may have just witnessed the birth of
a new legend. <pc> and <if_woman>her<else>his<endif>
inspiring battles are to thank!

20529.「ただいま入った情報では\n 控えで用意していた モンスター３体が\n オリを破:
We've just received breaking news that three
of our monsters in reserve broke free from
captivity and escaped!

20530.「まずいぞ！ まずいぞぉ！\n <pc>選手 あぶなぁ～～～い！！:
T-this is really bad!
<pc>! Look out!!

20532.「これは いったい どうしたことだ！？\n 突如 現れた 仮面の男が ３体の魔物:
Just what is going on here?! A masked man
suddenly appears and defeats the monsters
in a single blow!

20533.「……と とにかく サプライズ続きの\n 本日の モンスター勝ち抜き戦でしたが\:
A...anyway... What a tournament full of
spectacle and surprise! That's all for today,
folks!

20534.「ンフフフフ……。\n じつに 見事な 勝ちっぷりでしたねぇ。\n 私 あなたの:
Hmm hmm hmmm... Quite the impressive victory
you had out there. Consider me a big fan.

20535.「それにしても あの仮面の男……\n どうやら バトルマスターだったようなので\:
But still, that masked man... He looks like
a battlemaster, too. I think I'll call him
"Maskmaster" for short.

20536.「彼は いったい 何者なんでしょうねぇ？\n あの後 係員たちが 探したのですが:
Just who is he, anyway? Our staff looked all
over for him after the fight, but he was
nowhere to be found.

20537.「あれほどの実力を持ちながら\n 正体を隠し 姿をくらますなんて\n よほど 後:
Such incredible skill, but hiding his identity
and just up and vanishing... I wonder if
he's actually some shady guy?

20538.「ンフフフフ……。\n あなたといい 仮面バスターといい\n やはり コロシアム:
Hmm hmm hmm.... Between you and the
Maskmaster, the Coliseum's been pretty exciting.

20539.「おお よくやってくれたな！\n オメーの活躍は見せてもらってたぜ。\n おかげ:
Oh! I watched your fights and you did amazing!
Thanks to you, my debt's wiped clean!
Eh heh heh...

20540.「これは 師匠からの ごほうびだ。\n ありがたく 受け取るがいいぞ。:
This is a reward from master to pupil.
Please take it!

20541.「オメーの はたらきには\n これからも期待してるからな。\n オレの言うことを:
I'll be counting on your success from now on.
Just be sure to listen well to what I say, all
right?

20542.「いきなり モンスター勝ち抜き戦に\n 放り込むなんて 相変わらず\n 弟子使い:
Throwing someone straight into the Monster
Knockout Battle... You're being rough as
ever on your new pupil.

20543.「ゲゲッ！ テメーは セインズ……。\n 今さら 何しに現れやがった！？:
H-hey! You're Sainz...
What are you doing here?!

20544.「あんたが 新しい弟子をとったと聞いて\n 様子を見にきたんですよ。\n 元弟子:
I heard you took in a new pupil, so I came to
check on things. As one of your former pupils,
I just had to see for myself.

20545.「お前さんが <pc>か。\n モンスター勝ち抜き戦 見せてもらったよ。\n な:
So you're <pc>? I was watching your
fights. Your skills aren't half bad.

20546.「しかし こんな師匠を持っちまって\n 苦労するよなぁ……オレなんて\n 途中で:
But it must be pretty hard to have this guy
as your master... I had to give up with him
about halfway through.

20547.「まあ 何かあったら この不肖の先輩が\n 相談にのるからよ。\n くじけずに:
Well...if you find yourself in trouble, this
washed-up old-timer should help you.
Just hang in there, and keep at it.

20548.「……ケッ！ \n 師匠不孝モンが 先輩風 吹かせやがって！:
Pfft! Washed-up old-timer?!
Such an ungrateful pupil acting all high
and mighty...

20549.「ああ 胸クソ悪い。\n 今日はもう 寝ちまうことにするぜ！:
Ugh, I'm all ticked off now.
I'm just gonna go hit the sack for today!

60355.「１回戦の相手は あばれこまいぬ。\n この残忍かつ 凶暴な魔物を相手に\n <:
For their first round, their opponent is a Foo
Dog. How will <pc> fight against
this ferocious beast?

60357.「見事 あばれこまいぬを倒した\n <pc>選手。\n しかし その苦難は まだ:
<pc> defeats the Foo Dog with
flying colors! However, this is only the
beginning!

60358.<if_woman>「２回戦の相手は イエティ。\n この 恐るべき怪物を相手に:
Their next opponent is the burly Powie Yowie.
How will our <pc> deal with such
a fearsome foe this time?!
